timeline.bodyText:
How is the user supposed to obtain an instance of this interface? Do you expect an explicit
PMMLRuntimeFactory factory = new PMMLRuntimeFactoryImpl();
?
What about add a kie.conf for PMMLRuntimeFactoryImpl and then replicate the same mechanism of KieServices?

timeline.bodyText: What about overload this method with another one without kieBase parameter so that user can leverage on default kieBase if available? I expect most of the users might not be aware of the name of the kBase when there is a default

Such file will be looked for in the classpath + * (e.g. provided by Maven dependency) + * + * @param modelName + * @param pmmlFileName + * @return + */ + PMMLRuntime getPMMLRuntimeFromClasspath(String modelName, String pmmlFileName); + + /** + * Retrieve a PMMLRuntime bound to the org.dmg.pmml.Model + * with the given modelName that should be present in the + * with the given pmmlFileName. Such file will be looked for in the kjar + * loaded inside the KieContainer + * with the given gav + * + * @param modelName + * @param pmmlFileName + * @param kieBase the name of the Kiebase configured inside the kmodule.xml of the loaded kjar + * @param gav + * @return + */ + PMMLRuntime getPMMLRuntimeFromKieContainer(String modelName, String kieBase, String pmmlFileName, String gav);

timeline.bodyText:
Where are these fields populated? Is it something that subclasses has to handle? If so I think is quite error prone because if I forget to do that, no error is thrown but the fields are not populated.
What about an abstract method like populateMiningAndOutputFields() invoked in the constructor so that each subclass has to implement it?
timeline.author: danielezonca

replies.bodyText:
@danielezonca
To keep modifications at bare minimum those tow lists are populated in two different places:

during runtime compilation, inside KiePMMLModelRetriever, after the KiePMMLModel has been instantiated/populated by model-specific compilers
during codegen, inside model-specific codegen factories (see all methods invoking KiePMMLModelFactoryUtils.setKiePMMLModelConstructor)

It could be refactored, but it would take some time, so in another ticket
replies.author: gitgabrio

timeline.author: danielezonca

replies.bodyText:
@danielezonca
"Stream.peek" should be used with caution
Code smell Major java:S3864
Replaced with map (returning the populated object)
